title: Saar Biotech - Chlorhexidine Gluconate Solution | disinfectant and antiseptic
meta: Chlorhexidine is a broad-spectrum antimicrobial biguanide used as a topical antiseptic and in dental practice for the treatment of inflammatory dental conditions caused by microorganisms.Chlorhexidine, also known as chlorhexidine gluconate (CHG), is a disinfectant and antiseptic.
